channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Food fly tipping on road, 20th January
item.description:
Around 4 and 6 Oakwood drive, Hucclecote GL3 3Jf it appears that someone is throwing food out onto the road and it's not only looking awful, getting tracked all over road from where people drive on it, also had a sighting of a rat! Would really appreciate your help. Many thanks .
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Oakwood Drive, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole is deeper than it looks in picture. Picture does not do it justice, 20th January
item.description:
As you come out of Haymanâ€™s close and turn left onto Greenhills road it is between no 18 and 19 Greenhills road. I have had a knee replacement and live at no 19 and rhe pavement is bad so have to walk on the road and this is really dangerous. Needs fixing ASAP

item.title: Left over leaves, 20th January
item.description:
This location is on Prestbury Road as you walk towards the roundabout on the rhs. The pavement and road are a slip hazard. There is also a lot of leaves left on the corner of Prestbury Road next to the Pittville roundabout on the Left hand side. This makes it difficult to cross the road for more than one person

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 8, Wyman's Road, Whaddon, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: I cannot over-state - this road is simply loaded with potholes, 20th January
item.description:
I am local to this route. I see no outstanding posthole reports but I'm sorry, it would take me ages to report each pothole. Some are very dangerous and road users swerve / avoid and come very close to collision in an effort to avoid. I have reported 1 generically, but in point of fact there are too many. Loose tarmace also makes braking a hazard (reduced traction on gravel). I feel like taking a video of the entire route, putting lines around the holes because at night or when full of water, it's impossible to see just how deep some of them are.. Please please help ! Steve
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hayden Lane, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
